attributes.action: Increase the punishment for people who commit crimes such as stabbings.
attributes.additional_details: This way there will be less stabbing murders and assaults across the UK. Teenagers would also stop carrying knives.
attributes.background: To make the punishment more strict so more teens will stop carrying knives

rejection.details:
We understand that you want to see changes to punishments for crimes involving knives, but we're not exactly sure what changes you'd like to see. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like to happen. 

You may wish to sign some of these petitions: 

Increase sentences relating to knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563199

Two year minimum sentencing for 1st time offenders caught with a knife 16 yrs +: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554242

Fund a national public awareness campaign about knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570825
